entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-02-15
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Hot Reload related API should use platforms units for all platforms #4704
  • Fake issue #4703
  • microsoft.netcore.app.runtime.mono.android-arm.msi.x64 missing version #4701
  • Include Signing Key to MAUI project #4700
  • Add doc comments for BlazorWebView public APIs #4696
  • Excessive space on the right side of a checkbox #4693
  • ViewExtensions.GetViewTransform should return transform to root rather than parent #4690
  • [Bug] Push to top using minus margin or TranslateY make CollectionView disappear #4686
  • Can not change the vertical and horizontal if the MauiSplahScreen #4684
  • RadioButton content truncated #4683

Closed

  • Trust anchor for certification path not found #4705
  • Unable to delete bin folder while VS is open #3468
  • Preview 13 missing Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration 6.0.2 mauipre.1.22012.15 nuget #4692
  • Visual Studio Professional 2022 Preview 17.1.0 Preview 1.1 throwing error on initial app start #3792
  • GetNamedColor - remove #3947
  • [Bug] OnIdiom doesn't identify Mac as Desktop #2423
  • [Spec] Finish up NavBar/NavTextColor implementation win WinUI and UI Tests #912
  • HTTP Image Caching Support #1966
  • ControlTemplates loaded from Styles fail to load correctly when not using XAMLCompilation #3793
  • MAUI adorner layer displays adorners in wrong place #4675
    6.0.300-preview.14
  • Partial methods not compiling in MAUI Class Libraries #4666
  • Acces to unique ID of the device #4670
  • Images using URL for Source do not load on IOS #4231
  • [Android] Setting the BackgroundColor property in a ContentPage have not effect #4017
  • .NET MAUI Project referencing .NET MAUI Class library from a solution produces XA1018 error on build #3978
  • Unable to run Maui app in release mode #3910

PullRequests

Created

  • [ci] Add retryCountOnTaskFailure #4707
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Add GetHostedWindow #4706
  • Refactor Screenshot to use an interface #4699
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Some optimization to speed up device test discovery #4698
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Remove storage read from essentials android - file/media picker #4697
    area/essentials 🍞
  • [ci] Try to install the android image #4691
    platform/android 🤖, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [WinUI] Use XamlRoot for GetViewTransform #4689
    partner/ui-tools

Merged

  • [tests] Add Task.Delay to some unreliable tests #4637
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Try enabling FabricBot #4702
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Blazor Windows Open Links in Browser with Configurability #4680
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Add ExecutionPolicy and NoProfile to powershell command #4678
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Essentials.MediaPicker refactored to interface and singleton #4663
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Implement image caching functionality for iOS #4515
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, 6.0.300-preview.14
  • [X] Identify Setter property target in VSG case #4607
  • [iOS] Replace UIDevice.CheckSystemVersion checks #4635
    platform/iOS 🍎
  • Remove IToolbar from IStackNavigationView #4654
  • [Android] Fix the math for GenerateAdornerOffset #4677
    partner/ui-tools, 6.0.300-preview.14
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #4681
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [X] use compiled converter for Color #4687
    area/Xaml </>
  • [Core] Implement IsReadOnly property in SearchBar #3391
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Update Android Gallery to use Maui #1558
    6.0.200-preview.11

Updated

  • Renaming public APIs Native --> Platform #4599
    area/architecture
  • Refactor SecureStorage into an interface #4668
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Add handling and tests for TextTransform for SearchBar/Editor/Entry #4554
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • Blazor Android Open Links in Browser with Configurability #4645
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Interfaced BorderHandler and CheckBoxHandler #4676
    area/controls 🎮
  • [Core] Implement SizeChanged event #4541
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/controls 🎮, control-general
  • [Windows] Implement IsFocused property and Focus(), Unfocus() methods #4562
    platform/windows 🪟, area/a11y
  • [iOS] Implement IsFocused property and Focus(), Unfocus() methods #4588
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/a11y
  • Implement InputView IsSpellCheckEnabled property #3729
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Android] Implement IsFocused property and Focus(), Unfocus() methods #4587
    platform/android 🤖, area/a11y
  • Implement LineBreakMode property in ButtonHandler #4664
    area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • Implement Padding property in ImageButtonHandler #4665
    area/controls 🎮, control-button
  • [iOS, Catalyst] Shell View Handler #4616
    area/shell 🐢
  • [iOS] Update DatePickerHandler and TimePickerHandler #3761
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker
  • Implement InputTransparent property #4513
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [iOS] Implement VerticalTextAlignment property in Label #3714
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label
  • Refactor Share to use an interface #4674
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Refactor Accelerometer into an interface #4630
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Refactor SemanticScreenReader to use an interface #4673
  • Essentials.Barometer refactored to interface and singleton #4604
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials.Accelerometer refactored to interface and singleton #4644
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Essentials.Gyroscope refactored to interface and singleton #4649
    area/essentials 🍞
  • Implement RefreshViewHandler on Windows #3299
    area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview
  • Implement touch events in GraphicsView #3261
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/drawing ✏️
  • Allow to use string to define StrokeShape in XAML #3256
    area/Xaml </>, area/drawing ✏️
  • Scoping doc #4679
